questions.text: What day does Asha's father promise he'll be back home?
questions.answer: He promises he'll be back by Diwali

questions.text: What does the village witch say Asha must sacrifice to have a successful journey?
What bird guides Asha and Jeevan on their journey?
What does Jeevan do on their train ride to Zandapur that gets the two of them kicked off?
questions.answer: He sneezes, alerting the train guards

questions.text: What happens to Jeevan's younger brother when he is five?
questions.answer: His younger brother dies of fever

questions.text: What animal tries to attack Jeevan while he sleeps?
What do we learn is significant about the moon on Diwali?
questions.answer: The celebration falls on the darkest day of the month, when there is no moon

questions.text: What does Nina give the children when they get into the taxi with her?
questions.answer: She offers them a poisoned barfi

questions.text: What does Asha see when she wakes up in the hospital in Zandipur?
questions.answer: The mango seedling has grown overnight, and the spirit bird is at the window

questions.text: Asha often uses a Devay. What is this?
questions.answer: A small clay pot filled with oil and a wick, similar to a tea light
